blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: I really respect Taliesin for having the confidence to do whatever the fuck he wants with his hair and dress however he likes...
body: I really respect Taliesin for having the confidence to do whatever the fuck he wants with his hair and dress however he likes and just all around present himself how he chooses! It’s one thing to do that when you’re a teen or in your twenties, but people tend to frown on that stuff more as you get older, like you’re supposed to outgrow all that and be serious and practical all the time with your appearance. And then you’ve got Taliesin who’s in his early forties and has a mohawk dyed in the colors of the bi pride flag. And yeah he’s in entertainment and has more freedom than a lot of adults do for that kind of stuff, but it still makes me feel happy and encouraged to see adults being themselves and doing what they like with their appearance! It reminds me that you don’t have to give up your identity as you grow older!

And then you’ve got Taliesin who’s in his early forties and has a mohawk dyed in the colors of the bi pride flag. tags: i feel weird and guilty in asking
but idk who to turn to or what else to do
summary: If anyone in the Critical Role community is willing to help a fellow critter in need I would greatly appreciate it. We barely...
body:
If anyone in the Critical Role community is willing to help a fellow critter in need I would greatly appreciate it. We barely have food at home and can hardly have a full meal. My mom is the sole provider and her paycheck barely covers the bills, which means that there’s little to nothing left to buy groceries. I’m constantly job hunting and for the past several months there’s been no such luck.

If you’re willing to donate Thank You. Even if you can’t because bills and other necessities I completely understand. Just getting this reblogged and for others to see and help is enough. I don’t want my family and I to keep going hungry each week. I’ve seen how amazing this community is and I love being apart of it.

PayPal: paypal.me/sleepyharley

Cash App: $LeslyeDM

summary:
I paused Critical Role during an intense card game between Scanlan and an NPC and... their FACES
Vax: Trying not to look...
body:
I paused Critical Role during an intense card game between Scanlan and an NPC and… their FACES

Vax: Trying not to look concerned and failing

Vex: Unabashedly looking concerned

Pike: Worriedly lifting her eyebrows and shifting around

Grog: GLEE

Scanlan: Determined, knowing, and honestly kinda sultry look while leaning forward in his chair

Percy: Hmmmmmmm

Keyleth: Has no goddamn idea what’s happening

blog.name: injuries-in-dust
blog.title: Remembering The Unforgettable
blog.description:
"Write your injuries in dust, your benefits in marble.”
- Benjamin Franklin.
~
Pottermore Username: NimbusStrike69
~
Name is Adam. British. Wiccan.

For years I have struggled to cope with depression and self-injury. I'm not entirely free but I think that I'm better than I used to be. Good days and bad ones.
I'm a writer of fantasy novels. I'm currently working on my seventh.
While none of the others have been published yet this does not stop me writing. 

I love all things sci/fi and fantasy. 
Love Stephen King and Terry Pratchett, Agatha Christie, Michael Chrichton, along with a large variety of other authors.
